review: Love it! My only issue is that it natively lacks some potentially awesome functionality. It would be wonderful to be able to stream photos from the Android gallery app. Hopefully that will happen with future Chromecast software updates. VLC is supposed to be coming out with ability to Chromecast video in their next version, which will also be nice. There are third-party applications that add this functionality, but it should really be part of the Android OS.
